articles.title: Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant pre-wedding festivities: Who’s-who of the business world to descend in... - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Blackstone chairman Stephen Schwarzman, Disney CEO Bob Iger, Morgan Stanley CEO Ted Pick, Bank of America chairman Brian Thomas Moynihan, Adnoc CEO Sultan Ahmed Al Jaber, EL Rothschild chair Lynn Forester de Rothschild, and Adobe CEO Shantanu Narayen, are amo…
articles.content: The pre-wedding celebrations of Anant Ambani in Jamnagar in early March are anticipated to be attended by a host of international business luminaries, including Microsoft founder Bill Gates, Meta CEO… [+2108 chars]
